_about._upper: Food Planet was made possible through the Europeana Food and Drink project, which is funded by the European Commission under the ICT Policy Support Programme as part of the Competitiveness and Innovation Framework Programme.
_about._lower: The aim of the game is to challenge other individuals from across the globe, while learning interesting facts about dishes, meals, ingredients, tools and utensils that are found world-wide.
_about._followup: With this game one can also share their own images and let others guess which country that particular item originates from.
_about._letsstart: So lets start guessing and find out where on Earth the items are from!

_upload._sentforverification: Your submission has been sent for verification

_challenge._selectWhere: Select where you think the food is from
_challenge._fasterAnswer: The faster you answer, the more points you get
_challenge._somequestions: Some questions may have more than 1 answer
_challenge._whereonearth: Where on earth is this from?
